::SnowCat::

She tansformed into bot and walked in after him. She stopped about 10 
feet inside the ship.  Her instincts told her she had arrived at the 
place where she was supposed to be at.  She looked around with a 
little amazement in her eyes. She looked at the damage and still saw 
something special about the place.  This was the ARK.  She had 
dreamed of it, but this was far from what she ever would have thought 
it to look like. It was charred, had holed in the walls, falling 
apart.  She said in a soft voice,"What happened here?" She didn't 
even realize she had spoken aloud. She was transfixed on the ship.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus nods. "Allright, I'll show you where they are," he says, 
transforming 
> into robot mode and walking off toward the Ark.
